TopicTitle: What we can pull together so far:

Articles.Content:
- For this probable April Fools day prank, we all have Moderator, except for the people who joined after it was set.
- All the original mods are typing in comic sans font.
- They are also acting like nothing ever happened, and that this has always been like this.
- The original mods and admins have changed their avatars to poorly drawn things that looks like it was made in 5 seconds on Windows paint/photo editing software

I will be editing this as I find more information. Anyone else see anything weird?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T12:25:54Z" title="04/01/2015 12:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by michaelsteele3**

Nope, nothing else. 

//woops cannot comic sans ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I'll be back within an hour or so. I hope nothing else weird happens

Wat r u guys talking about the mods have always been like that

 if u keep lying like dis, ill have 2 ban u

> 
> The original mods and admins have changed their avatars to poorly drawn things that looks like it was made in 5 seconds on Windows paint/photo editing software

Hey! I took at least twice that long on mine.

> 
> Hey! I took at least twice that long on mine.

It's him! Run!
TIL I was an original Mod/Admin
Actually, this work of art took me about 2 minutes! Liiiiiieeeeeeeek meeeeeee!
comic sans is a myth. Comic sans doesn't exist, it's an illusion.

I think everyone just needs to make an MS paint version of their avatars, just for fun.

Heck, that should be a subreddit.

"ms paint-ize"

...People try to make an ms paint-style clone of a picture. Heck, I could start it off with some samples!

![X5oku9u.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/X5oku9u.jpg)

![dsCx3BC.png](http://i.imgur.com/dsCx3BC.png)
Nothing happened and nobody is using comic sans.
